name: Gremlins
description: WARNING! Do not feed after midnight or get them wet. You were warned! Now look at the mess. The Mogwai have multiplied, and some have turned into Gremlins. Can you keep them away from the refrigerator and out of the water? Can you pick up the food, turn off the corn popper, collect the Mogwai and slash out at the Gremlins â€“ before the Gremlins get you?
